mapper.insert: INSERT INTO surveytopic(surveytopicno, surveyno, title, seqno) VALUES(surveytopic_seq.nextval, #{surveyno}, #{title}, #{seqno})
mapper.select: SELECT surveytopicno, surveyno, title, seqno FROM surveytopic WHERE surveyno = #{surveyno} ORDER BY seqno
SELECT surveytopicno, surveyno, title, seqno FROM surveytopic ORDER BY surveytopicno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM surveytopic
WHERE UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'

SELECT surveytopicno, surveyno, title, seqno FROM surveytopic
WHERE UPPER(topic) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT surveytopicno, surveyno, title, seqno, r FROM ( SELECT surveytopicno, surveyno, title, seqno, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT surveytopicno, surveyno, title, seqno FROM surveytopic WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(surveytopicno) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') ORDER BY seqno ASC )
) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}
SELECT r.surveytopicno, r.surveyno,c.topic , r.title, r.seqno FROM survey c, surveytopic r WHERE c.surveyno = r.surveyno ORDER BY r.surveytopicno DESC
